author: noel
msg: Updated web site for recent changes to contributors, docs and changelog

author: noel
msg: Add the ability to authorize networks using a new <authorizedAddresses> element.  SMTP AUTH can be enabled generally, and then disabled for authorized networks.  Added support for fast-fail rejection of relay requests.  Reduced calls to check permissions.

author: noel
msg: Changed from internal representation from Vector to ArrayList

author: noel
msg: Improve performance getting message size.  Two changes: (a) cache the size, (b) use File.length() for file-based message stores.
